document.full_text: kentucky survived on brandon knight's layup with 2 seconds remaining to edge princeton, 59-57, in its opening game of the n.c.a.a. tournament.
document.title: east: kentucky 59, princeton 57: pushed by princeton, kentucky wins in final seconds
